title: Diamond jungle LFT Serious play- Fiddle main, but can learn anything.
body:
Hey guys,

Diamond Jungler LFT - serious play.

- Play everyday
- Can get any chat app
- Fiddle main, can learn anything needed for team
- IGN Mr Scarecrow

replies.body: I have added you in League. We can talk about you joining our team if/when your available c: We're all Plat/Diamonds. (IGN: AdTueri)
